solution_line_template: A pound of coffee makes 40 cups of coffee, so {coffee_lbs} lbs. coffee * {cups_per_lb} cups of coffee per lb. = <<{coffee_lbs}*{cups_per_lb}={total_cups_of_coffee}>>{total_cups_of_coffee} cups of coffee.

Angie drinks {cups_per_day} cups of coffee a day, so she has enough coffee to last her {total_cups_of_coffee} cups of coffee / {cups_per_day} cups of coffee per day = <<{total_cups_of_coffee}/{cups_per_day}={days_coffee_lasts}>>{days_coffee_lasts} days
